# 0.2.0

- The builder and fs-watcher now prerr stderr messages, in addition to the stdout messages.
- dune-mode.el: better build root detection.

# 0.1.1

- fix typo, inodewait -> inotifywait (DoYe ZAN <zandoye@gmail.com>)
- Linux: inotifywait now runs with -q option
- jbuilder build is now executed with --dev option

# 0.1.0

* Works also with Linux + inotifywait.
* _dune_watch config file for the configurable exclusion list
* dune-mode.el to run dune_watch in Emacs

# 0.0.1

* Initial release
* Works only with Mac OS X + fswatch.
